full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Details of the Procurement
* **Contract Reference Number:** WS4053582707-Doc4056811005
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4053582707
* **Report a Change Number:** 5
* **Posting Date:** 2023-06-29
* **Closing Date:** 2023-08-15T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-08-14

## Description of the Procurement
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the procurement of Quick Response Vehicles.

## Requirements
The successful contractor must provide a Quick Response Vehicle for use by the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP). The contractor must submit all required supporting documentation, including a detailed bid, on or before the closing date.

## Important Information
AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Disregard the previously posted response deadline and closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on August 15, 2023 by 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time. Bids submitted after 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time will be declared non-responsive.

## Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
* The lowest price

## Excluded Bidders
The following bidders have been excluded from this procurement:
* None

## Trade Agreements
The following trade agreements apply:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

## Important Dates
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-03-31
* Expected Contract End Date: 2025-03-31

## Contact Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Person: Mr
